name: Breakfast on the Boyne
preparation:
Each ingredient brings another delicious element to this winner from the Slane Cocktail Series. There’s sweetness from sloe gin, a burst of citrus from lemon juice and bitterness from coffee liqueur. To tie it all together, bartender Natalie D. Lichtman uses triple-casked Irish whiskey.

Add all the ingredients except the gin into a shaker with ice and shake.

Strain into a chilled rocks glass.

Float the sloe gin over the top (so it settles at the bottom of the glass).
